### 📦 Installation

```bash
npm install shellgpt@latest
```

### 🎯 Usage

```bash
# Interactive chat
npx shellgpt

# Single message
npx shellgpt send "Hello, how are you?"

# With custom options
npx shellgpt send "Explain quantum physics" --model gpt-4 --temperature 0.3
```
